title: Why won't 'Hey Google' work on my pixel 5 when it works on my pixel 3?
content:
I recently upgraded from Pixel 3 to Pixel 5. But Hey Google or Ok Google doesn't work on my new Pixel 5. I've troubleshooter and ensured that Voice Match, Assistant etc is all turned on. With both my Pixel 3 & 5 sitting side my side, all settings are the same. When I say Hey Google, my Pixel 3 assistant responds but nothing happens on my Pixel 5. So frustrating :(

Takes all the fun out of upgrading to a new Pixel.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 5
